data.eml:eml: Review of the New World genus Nanium Townes, 1967 (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Ctenopelmatinae), with two new species from the Neotropical region

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reshchikov, Alexey, Sääksjärvi, Ilari E., Pollet, Marc (2018): Review of the New World genus Nanium Townes, 1967 (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Ctenopelmatinae), with two new species from the Neotropical region. European Journal of Taxonomy 459: 1-18, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.459
